  • Constructor Details

    • RisikoGame

      public RisikoGame​(Player[] players, java.lang.String terrFile, java.lang.String continentsFile, java.lang.String missionsFile) throws java.lang.NumberFormatException, java.io.IOException
      Creates and initializes a RisikoGame
      Parameters:
      players - are the players of the game
      terrFile - is the file containing the territories
      continentsFile - is the file containing the continents
      missionsFile - is the file containing the missions
      Throws:
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - if there are problems with the parsing
      java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the file
